TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SoapException extends System.SystemException

summary.span: 表示通过 SOAP 调用 XML Web services 方法且出现异常时引发的异常。

span.span: Represents the exception that is thrown when an XML Web service method is called over SOAP and an exception occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以由公共语言运行时或 XML Web service 方法引发。The can either be thrown by the common language runtime or by an XML Web service method. 如果对请求的响应的格式不正确, 公共语言运行时可能会引发。The common language runtime can throw a if a response to a request is not formatted correctly. XML Web service 方法只需在 XML Web service 方法中引发异常即可生成。XML Web service methods can generate a by simply throwing an exception within the XML Web service method. 如果客户端通过 SOAP 访问方法, 则会在服务器上捕获异常, 并将其包装在新的中。If the client accessed the method over SOAP, the exception is caught on the server and wrapped inside a new . 引发的具有以下属性值:The thrown has the following property values: |PropertyProperty|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||原始异常的属性。 The property of the original exception.| ||。.| ||XML Web service 方法的 URL。The URL of the XML Web service method.| ||`null`, 但错误元素中存在一个空的详细信息元素。`null`, but an empty detail element is present in the fault element.| 当客户端使用 SOAP 调用时, XML Web service 方法可能会引发。An XML Web service method might throw a when clients call using SOAP. 如果 XML Web service 引发, 则可以通过添加其他详细信息, 如果引发了另一种类型的异常, 则可以通过 XML Web service 方法设置这些属性。If an XML Web service throws the , other details can be added through the , and properties that cannot otherwise be set by an XML Web service method if another type of exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例引发一个 , 其中 XML Web service 方法设置属性。The following example throws a where the XML Web service method sets the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic SoapException Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic SoapException Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

summary.span: 使用以下内容初始化 类的新实例：指定的异常消息、异常代码、标识引起异常的代码块的 URI、表示用于处理 SOAP 消息的 XML Web service 功能的 URI、与异常关联的人类语言、特定于应用程序的异常信息、SOAP 错误的子代码以及对异常的根源的引用。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified exception message, exception code, URI that identifies the piece of code that caused the exception, URI that represents the XML Web service's function in processing the SOAP message, the human language associated with the exception, the application-specific exception information, the subcode for the SOAP fault and reference to the root cause of the exception.

Public ReadOnly Property Actor As String

member this.Actor : string

summary.span: 获取导致异常的代码段。

span.span: Gets the piece of code that caused the exception.
The piece of code that caused the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅可使用接受参数的构造函数之一来设置属性。The property can only be set using one of the constructors that accepts an argument. 发出 SOAP 请求时, 会将消息发送到在 SOAP 执行组件属性中指定的收件人。When a SOAP request is made, the message is sent to a recipient, which is specified in a SOAP actor attribute. 如果 XML Web service 中发生异常, 则会将 SOAP 执行组件特性的值分配给该属性。If an exception occurs within an XML Web service, the value of the SOAP actor attribute is assigned to the property. 对于使用 ASP.NET 创建的 XML Web services, XML Web service 方法的 URL 是 SOAP 执行组件属性的值, 并在属性中返回。For XML Web services created using ASP.NET, the URL to the XML Web service method is the value of the SOAP actor attribute and is returned in the property. 有关 SOAP 执行组件属性的详细信息, 请参阅[soap](https://www.w3.org/TR/soap/)规范。For more information on the SOAP actor attribute, see the [SOAP](https://www.w3.org/TR/soap/) specification. ## Examples 下面的 Web 窗体示例调用`Math` XML Web service 方法, 该方法在发生被零除的情况下引发异常。The following Web Form example calls the `Math` XML Web service method, which throws an exception if a division by zero occurs. 当引发异常时, Web 窗体将捕获异常, 并将异常详细信息 (包括和属性) 输出到控件中。When the exception is thrown, the Web Form catches the exception and outputs the exception details, including the and properties, into an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic SoapException.Actor Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException.Actor Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic SoapException.Actor Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException.Actor Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 为了使前面的 web 窗体使用以下`Math` web 服务示例, 在创建代理类的过程中指定了的`MyMath`命名空间。In order for the preceding Web Form to use the following `Math` Web Service example, a namespace of `MyMath` was specified during the creation of the proxy class. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic SoapException.Actor Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException.Actor Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic SoapException.Actor Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException.Actor Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

summary.span: 指定 SOAP 错误代码，该代码表示客户端调用的格式设置不正确或者没有包含适当的信息。

span.span: Specifies a SOAP fault code that represents a client call that is not formatted correctly or does not contain the appropriate information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如, 当客户端调用没有正确的身份验证或付款信息时, 就可以生成。An example of when a can be generated, is when a client call does not have proper authentication or payment information. 它通常指示在重新发送客户端调用之前, 必须对其进行更改。It is generally an indication that the client call must be changed before it is resent. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic SoapException.Detail Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException.Detail Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic SoapException.Detail Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException.Detail Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

summary.span: 获取 SOAP 错误代码的类型。

span.span: Gets the type of SOAP fault code.

value.span: 一个指定所出现的 SOAP 错误代码的 。

span.span: An that specifies the SOAP fault code that occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有在创建类的新实例时, 才能设置属性。The property can only be set when creating a new instance of the class. 类通过 SOAP XML Web service 调用 XML Web service 方法的客户端使用。The class is for use by XML Web service clients that call XML Web service methods over SOAP. ASP.NET 处理调用的客户端是否使用 SOAP。ASP.NET handles whether the client that calls uses SOAP. 这是 XML Web service 中发生异常时。This is when an exception occurs in an XML Web service. 如果客户端使用 SOAP, 则 ASP.NET 会将特定异常包装在中, 并设置和属性。If the client uses SOAP, ASP.NET wraps the specific exception into a and sets the and properties. 可用代码集称为 SOAP 协议版本1.1 的 SOAP 错误代码, 如下所示:The set of available codes, known as SOAP Fault Codes for SOAP protocol version 1.1, are the following: |项Item|说明Description| |----------|-----------------| ||找到 SOAP 信封的无效命名空间。An invalid namespace for a SOAP envelope was found.| ||并非所有 SOAP 元素都需要处理。Not all SOAP elements require processing. 但是, 如果 SOAP 元素使用`MustUnderstand`值为1的属性进行标记, 则它是必需的。However, if a SOAP element is marked with the `MustUnderstand` attribute with a value of 1, it is required. 未能处理元素会产生此异常。Failure to process the element generates this exception.| ||客户端调用的格式不正确或未包含相应的信息。A client call was not formatted correctly or did not contain the appropriate information. 例如, 客户端调用可能没有正确的身份验证或付款信息。For example, the client call might not have the proper authentication or payment information. 它通常指示消息必须在重新发送之前进行更改。It is generally an indication that the message must be changed before it is resent.| ||处理服务器上的客户端调用时出错, 但问题不是由消息内容引起。An error occurred during the processing of a client call on the server, however, the problem is not due to the message contents. 例如, 上游服务器可能因网络问题而无法响应某一请求。For example, an upstream server might not respond to a request due to network problems. 通常, 对于这种类型的异常, 客户端调用以后可能会成功。Typically, with this type of exception, the client call might succeed later. 如果 XML Web service 引发异常, 而不是客户端使用 SOAP 调用, 则 ASP.NET 会将异常转换为, 并将属性设置为 , 并将其返回到客户端。If an XML Web service throws an exception, other than and the client calls using SOAP, ASP.NET converts the exception to a , setting the property to and throws it back to the client.| ## Examples 下面的 web 窗体示例将`Math`调用 web 服务方法, 如果发生被零除, 则会引发异常。The following Web Form example calls the `Math` Web Service method, which throws an exception if a division by zero occurs. 引发异常后, Web 窗体将捕获异常并将异常详细信息 (包括和属性) 输出到控件中。Once the exception is thrown, the Web Form catches the exception and outputs the exception details, including the and properties into a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[classic soapexception.actor example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException.Actor Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[classic soapexception.actor example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException.Actor Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 为了使前面的 Web 窗体使用以下`Math` XML Web service 示例, 在创建代理类的过程中指定了的`MyMath`命名空间。In order for the preceding Web Form to use the following `Math` XML Web service example, a namespace of `MyMath` was specified during the creation of the proxy class. [!code-aspx-csharp[classic soapexception.actor example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException.Actor Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[classic soapexception.actor example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException.Actor Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

summary.span: 获取表示应用程序特定的详细错误信息的 。

span.span: Gets an that represents the application-specific error information details.

value.span: 应用程序特定的错误信息。

span.span: The application-specific error information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用一个接受值的类构造函数来设置属性。The property can be set using one of the class constructors that accepts a value. 属性用于提供与 SOAP 请求的元素相关的应用程序特定的`Body`错误详细信息。 The property is used to supply application-specific error details related to the `Body` element of the SOAP request. 根据 soap 规范, 如果因 soap 请求的`Body`元素而无法处理客户端请求而发生错误, 则必须设置属性。According to the SOAP specification, if an error occurs because the client request cannot be processed due to the `Body` element of the SOAP request, the property must be set. 如果 soap 请求的标头条目中出现错误, 则必须引发, 以便在 soap 标头中返回错误详细信息。If an error occurs in the header entries of the SOAP request, you must throw a , so that the error details are returned in the SOAP header. 如果错误未发生, 则由于处理`Body`元素, 因此不能设置属性。If the error does not occur, due to the processing of the `Body` element, then the property must not be set. 在 为属性生成时 ,可以使用的和属性来确保与SOAP规范保持一致。 In building an for the property, the and properties of can be used to ensure consistency with the SOAP specification. 详细信息元素的所有直接子元素称为详细信息条目, 每个详细信息条目都编码为详细信息元素内的独立元素。All immediate child elements of the detail element are called detail entries and each detail entry is encoded as an independent element within the detail element. ## Examples 下面的示例引发一个, 其中 XML Web service 方法设置属性。The following example throws a , where the XML Web service method sets the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic SoapException.Detail#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException.Detail Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic SoapException.Detail#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapException.Detail Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

span.span: if is equivalent to the SOAP fault code; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的接收方 `Client`可以使用此方法来确定属性在功能上是否等效于 soap 1.1 中定义的 soap 错误代码, 而不考虑所使用的 soap 协议的版本。Recipients of a can use this method to determine whether the property is functionally equivalent to the `Client` SOAP fault code defined in SOAP 1.1 regardless of the version of the SOAP protocol used. 超过1.1 的 soap 协议版本可能会对`Client` soap 版本1.1 中定义的 soap 错误代码使用不同的名称或命名空间, 这由字段表示。Versions of the SOAP protocol later than 1.1 might use different names or namespaces for the `Client` SOAP fault code defined in SOAP version 1.1, which is represented by the field. SOAP 1.2 命名错误代码`Sender`, 由字段表示。SOAP 1.2 names the fault code `Sender`, which is represented by the field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的接收方 `MustUnderstand`可以使用此方法来确定属性在功能上是否等效于 soap 1.1 中定义的 soap 错误代码, 而不考虑所使用的 soap 协议的版本。Recipients of a can use this method to determine whether the property is functionally equivalent to the `MustUnderstand` SOAP fault code defined in SOAP 1.1 regardless of the version of the SOAP protocol used. 超过1.1 的 soap 协议版本可能会对`MustUnderstand` soap 版本1.1 中定义的 soap 错误代码使用不同的名称或命名空间, 这由字段表示。Versions of the SOAP protocol later than 1.1 might use different names or namespaces for the `MustUnderstand` SOAP fault code defined in SOAP version 1.1, which is represented by the field. SOAP 1.2 将错误代码命名为相同的;但是, 它的作用域是不同的 XML 命名空间, 并由字段表示。SOAP 1.2 names the fault code the same; however it is scoped by a different XML namespace and is represented by the field.

summary.span: 获取与该异常关联的人类语言。

span.span: Gets the human language associated with the exception.

span.span: A value that identifies the human language associated with the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你的 Web 服务适用于多人语言, 则会引发异常, 并将消息文本或其他属性本地化为每种语言。If your Web service works with multiple human languages, throw exceptions with message text or other properties localized to each language. 使用此属性来标识与异常关联的语言。Use this property to identify the language associated with the exception.

summary.span: SOAP 错误代码，它表示没有处理用 特性标记的 SOAP 元素。

span.span: A SOAP Fault Code that represents a SOAP element marked with the attribute was not processed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 并非所有 SOAP 元素都需要服务器处理。Not all SOAP elements require processing by the server. 但是, 如果 SOAP 元素标记`MustUnderstand`的属性等于1或`true`, 则需要进行处理。However, if a SOAP element is marked with the `MustUnderstand` attribute equal to 1 or `true`, processing is required. 如果无法处理元素, 将生成带有的。Failure to process the element generates a with a .

summary.span: 获取表示导致异常的代码段的 URI。

span.span: Gets a URI that represents the piece of code that caused the exception.
The piece of code that caused the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用 SOAP 协议版本1.1 与 XML Web service 进行通信时, 将忽略属性。The property is ignored when the SOAP protocol version 1.1 is used to communicate with an XML Web service. 使用 soap 1.2 时, 属性`node`将在 soap 消息的`fault`元素内设置元素。When SOAP 1.2 is used, the property sets the `node` element within a `fault` element of a SOAP message. 和属性都标识导致异常的代码段; 它们只是分别引用其 SOAP 1.1 和 soap 1.2 名称。The and properties both identify the piece of code that caused the exception; they just refer to their SOAP 1.1 and SOAP 1.2 names respectively. 因为它们都引用相同的属性值, 所以应用程序只需访问属性即可。Because they both refer to the same property value, applications can just access the property. 这些属性的值由接受`actor`参数的构造函数设置。The value of these properties is set by the constructors that accept an `actor` parameter.

summary.span: 获取一个 URI，它表示用于处理 SOAP 消息的 XML Web services 功能。

span.span: Gets a URI that represents the XML Web service's function in processing the SOAP message.

value.span: 引发 的 XML Web services 的角色。

span.span: The role of the XML Web service throwing the .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用 SOAP 协议版本1.1 与 XML Web service 进行通信时, 将忽略属性。The property is ignored when the SOAP protocol version 1.1 is used to communicate with an XML Web service. 使用 soap 1.2 时, 属性`role`将在 soap 消息的`fault`元素内设置元素。When SOAP 1.2 is used, the property sets the `role` element within a `fault` element of a SOAP message.

summary.span: 指定一个 SOAP 错误代码，该错误代码表示在处理客户端对服务器的调用的过程中出错，但问题不是由消息内容导致的。

span.span: Specifies that a SOAP fault code that represents an error occurred during the processing of a client call on the server, where the problem is not due to the message contents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如, 如果被调用的服务器无法响应由于网络问题而导致的请求, 则可能会发生这种情况。A might occur, for example, if a server being called cannot respond to a request due to network problems. 通常, 对于这种类型的异常, 客户端调用以后可能会成功。Typically, with this type of exception, the client call might succeed later. 如果 XML Web service 引发异常, 而不是, 并且客户端使用 SOAP 协议与 XML Web service 通信, 则 ASP.NET 将返回 soap 错误。If an XML Web service throws an exception, other than the , and the client is communicating with the XML Web service using the SOAP protocol, ASP.NET returns a SOAP fault. 在客户端计算机上运行的 .NET Framework 将 SOAP 错误转换为, 并将属性设置为, 并向客户端引发此异常。The .NET Framework running on the client machine converts that SOAP fault into a , setting the property to , and throws that exception to the client.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode SubCode { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode SubCode
Public ReadOnly Property SubCode As SoapFaultSubCode

member this.SubCode : System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode

summary.span: 获取 SOAP 错误中 XML 元素包含的可选错误信息。

span.span: Gets the optional error information contained in the XML element of a SOAP fault.

value.span: 表示 SOAP 错误的 XML 元素内容的 。

span.span: A that represents the contents of the XML element of a SOAP fault.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用 SOAP 协议版本1.1 与 XML Web service 进行通信时, 将忽略属性。The property is ignored when the SOAP protocol version 1.1 is used to communicate with an XML Web service. `code`表示元素内容的`subcode`属性指定使用由 SOAP 协议指定的有限数量的预定义错误代码所发生的错误类型, 而可选元素允许用于提供特定于应用程序的用户定义错误代码的应用程序。The property that represents the contents of the `code` element specifies the type of error that occurred using a limited number of pre-defined error codes specified by the SOAP protocol, whereas the optional `subcode` element allows an application to provide user-defined error codes specific to the application. ASP.NET 定义由和字段表示的两个这类代码。ASP.NET defines two such codes that are represented by the and fields.

summary.span: SOAP 错误代码，它表示在处理 SOAP 消息的过程中发现无效的 SOAP 信封命名空间。

span.span: A SOAP fault code that represents an invalid namespace for a SOAP envelope was found during the processing of the SOAP message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SOAP 信封是表示 SOAP 消息的 XML 文档的顶级元素。A SOAP envelope is the top-level element of an XML document that represents a SOAP message.
